official_title: To extend until January 1, 1996, the existing suspension of duty on machines designed for heat-set, stretch texturing of continuous man-made fibers.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1995, the existing suspension of duty on machines designed for heat-set, stretch texturing of continuous man-made fibers.

titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1996, the existing suspension of duty on machines designed for heat-set, stretch texturing of continuous man-made fibers.
